author: Xbox
description:
The Ancients have awakened! Their wrath has laid waste to human settlements in Cluster 34, and the path of destruction leads to the Okkar Homeworlds. 

Take flight in this massive expansion containing an expanded storyline, four new star systems, a new playable ship, and more as the Cluster readies for war once again in EVERSPACE 2: Wrath of the Ancients, now available on Xbox and Microsoft Store!

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/everspace-2-wrath-of-the-ancients/9N1LN379MJ7F/0017
